timeline.message: Move configuration of test runtime to test invocation

timeline.author: bjorncs

timeline.bodyText:
A public static final field that is a mutable object is a bit awkward
for an interface. Should we make this an abstract class instead?
timeline.author: bjorncs

timeline.bodyText: Return unsupported method if not POST.
timeline.author: bjorncs
bjorncs

timeline.bodyText: Can this be simplified to a single method in JunitRunner?
timeline.author: bjorncs

timeline.bodyText: We may want to reuse this class in maven-vespa-plugin, perhaps hosted-apis.
timeline.author: bjorncs

timeline.bodyText: Maybe move location of manifest file as a constant in TestDescriptor
timeline.author: bjorncs
